card.name: Idaten Kid

card.text: ■ When you put this creature, you may destroy this creature. If you do, your opponent discards a card at random from their hand.

card.name: Father Earth
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and put it into its owner's mana zone. Then choose a non-evolution creature from your opponent's mana zone. Your opponent puts that creature into the battle zone.

card.name: Silver Scoop
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your creatures in the battle zone and put it into your mana zone. Then your opponent chooses one of their creatures in the battle zone and puts it into its owner's mana zone.

card.name: Next Charger
